name: Takeshi no Ch?senj?
description:
Takeshi no Ch?senj? is a game based on the ideas and bearing of the name of Japanese comedian Takeshi Kitano.

The player takes control of a regular office worker who finds out that there is a treasure hidden somewhere on an island. The game world consists mostly of urban areas and is viewed from a side-scrolling perspective. The protagonist can jump and punch any character he encounters, even including the old man at the password screen (which results in a game over). The player character's health is measured in hearts. Hostile characters may attack him, but most of the people on the streets and indoor locations are harmless.

Besides exploring locations, the game includes other activities, such as obtaining a divorce from the protagonist's wife, completing a side-scrolling shooting sequence with a hang glider, and using a microphone built into the Famicom's second controller to perform a karaoke song.
alsoFor: Android, iPad, iPhone, Wii | Combined View

shot.caption: Title screen. You can punch it!
You start in your boss's office. You just want to punch him
Going outside and punching people!
Watch out, old grannies! I'm going to PUNCH you!
"No smoking". Okay. At least punching is allowed
Ahh, the famed Ginza street in Tokyo. I feel so good I just want to punch somebody
I have so many dialogue options, but you know what I really want to do? That's right: punch!
I can jump! I can jump!... ... ... oh, and PUNCH, too
You punch your barber! What a day!
You punch the librarian!
You need to pay to play those pachinko machines. Wait... PUNCHinko machines??..
There is an object there... maybe I can punch it
I need flowers before I get back to punching people
You jump high in the office, resisting the temptation to punch that guy
Your order, sir? Why are you silent? What do you want me to do, punch you?..
In a bar, punching people!
Another bar. Very similar. Mmm... pur-ple... wait, I need to punch someone
You kneel and duck. Stupid, just punch ahead
Game Over! I was punched to death!
You can even punch the old guy who gives you your password!
